pkgmetadata.longdescription: Radio Beam: Tools for Beam IO and Manipulation==============================================Radio Beam is a simple toolkit for reading beam information from FITS headersand manipulating beams. Some example applications include: * Convolution and deconvolution * Unit conversion (Jy to/from K) * Handle sets of beams for spectral cubes with varying resolution between channels * Find the smallest common beam from a set of beams * Add the beam shape to a matplotlib plotSee the [documentation](https://radio-beam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) for more information.[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/radio-astro-tools/radio_beam.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/radio-astro-tools/radio_beam)
